user.title: DTSU666 Emulator Configuration
user.description: Configure the DTSU666 Modbus TCP server emulator. Map your Home Assistant sensor entities to the corresponding power meter registers.

data_description.port: TCP port for the Modbus server (default: 502)
data_description.voltage_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L1 voltage measurements
data_description.current_l1_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L1 current
data_description.power_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for output power
data_description.energy_import_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for imported energy
data_description.energy_export_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for exported energy
data_description.frequency_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for frequency
data_description.disable_validation: Disable validation that rejects connections when entities have invalid data

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use by another service

init.title: DTSU666 Emulator Options
init.description: Update all settings for the DTSU666 emulator. Network changes (port/unit ID) will restart the server automatically.

data_description.port: TCP port for the Modbus server (changing will restart server)
data_description.unit_id: Modbus unit/slave ID (changing will restart server)
data_description.voltage_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L1 voltage measurements
data_description.current_l1_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L1 current
data_description.power_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for output power
data_description.energy_import_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for imported energy
data_description.energy_export_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for exported energy
data_description.frequency_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for frequency
data_description.disable_validation: Disable validation that rejects connections when entities have invalid data

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use by another service
